author: Brian Turner
method: To make the risotto balls, roll the cooked risotto into balls and put some of the grated cheese into the centre of each ball. Coat the balls in breadcrumbs. Deep-fry in the hot oil for 2-3 minutes until golden. (CAUTION: Hot oil can be very dangerous. Do not leave unattended.) Serve the risotto balls with the lemon wedges
ingredients: 175g/6¼oz mushroom risotto, cooked ,  50g/1¾oz Manchego cheese, grated,  100g/3½oz breadcrumbs,  600ml/21¼fl oz oil, for frying,  lemon wedges, to garnish
